Detailed Description

Initialize and finalize SDK.

Function Documentation

◆ MV_CC_Initialize()

MV_CAMCTRL_API int __stdcall MV_CC_Initialize ( )

Initialize SDK.

Returns
Return MV_OK on success, and return Error Code on failure.
Examples
ChunkData.cpp, ConnectSpecCamera.cpp, Display.cpp, Events.cpp, ForceIP.cpp, ForceIPEx.cpp, Grab_Asynchronous.cpp, Grab_ImageCallback.cpp, GrabImage.cpp, GrabImage_HighPerformance.cpp, GrabMultipleCamera.cpp, HighBandwithDecode.cpp, ImageProcess.cpp, InterfaceAndDeviceDemo.cpp, InterfaceDemo.cpp, MultiCast.cpp, ParametrizeCamera_FileAccess.cpp, ParametrizeCamera_LoadAndSave.cpp, ReconnectDemo.cpp, SetIO.cpp, SetParam.cpp, Trigger_Image.cpp, and Trigger_ImageCallback.cpp.

◆ MV_CC_Finalize()

MV_CAMCTRL_API int __stdcall MV_CC_Finalize ( )

Terminate SDK.

Returns
Return MV_OK on success, and return Error Code on failure.
Examples
ChunkData.cpp, ConnectSpecCamera.cpp, Display.cpp, Events.cpp, ForceIP.cpp, ForceIPEx.cpp, Grab_Asynchronous.cpp, Grab_ImageCallback.cpp, GrabImage.cpp, GrabImage_HighPerformance.cpp, GrabMultipleCamera.cpp, HighBandwithDecode.cpp, ImageProcess.cpp, InterfaceAndDeviceDemo.cpp, InterfaceDemo.cpp, MultiCast.cpp, ParametrizeCamera_FileAccess.cpp, ParametrizeCamera_LoadAndSave.cpp, ReconnectDemo.cpp, SetIO.cpp, SetParam.cpp, Trigger_Image.cpp, and Trigger_ImageCallback.cpp.
